snippet: Caridad Manzueta, 20, struggled with insomnia and depression until an agency, Opportunities for a Better Tomorrow, helped her on a path to college.
abstract: Community Service Society, one of the seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, gives Caridad Manzueta, who suffered from depression, $65 fee she needed to apply to the Borough of Manhattan Community College; she hopes to be first in her family to graduate from college and plans to becomes a physician assistant.
lead_paragraph: Caridad Manzueta, 20, struggled with insomnia and depression until an agency, Opportunities for a Better Tomorrow, helped her on a path to college.

headline.main: Back to School, With Helping Others as Her Goal
